title: My Game keeps crashing
body: I've been playing league for over 2 ~ 3 years and recently I've had a problem with the game. I go in a rank game and my game will crash before it loads. It won't even go into the loading screen. I've tried to fix it but couldn't find a solution. I've lost two rank games because of this and have gotten a lower priority queue. I've just had enough with this problem.

replies.body: Assuming that by crash you mean bugsplat, then you may have a driver or game file issue that's failing to render the game.  Go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to troubleshoot and resolve this.  I recommend testing it out in a custom game to prevent further [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It isn't bug splash. You know when you enter a game the league of legends logo comes out? It just stays there frozen forever. {{champion:32}} feels bad man :(
